name: Accounts For Your Team
help: Add additional accounts for handling live chat and more.

name: Exclusive Engagements
help: More powerful Engagements to further enhance your store. Also includes experimental Engagements.

help: Premium clients have higher priority support.

name: Advanced Message Handling
help: Configure updates to be sent to third party platforms like Slack, or send them via text.
